template.name: Template IPMI ASUS ASMB4
template.description: ASUS ASMB4-iKVM/ASMB4-SOL PLUS Hardware Monitor / System Sensor related Autor template: m.beloglazov@gmail.com Version Zabbix: 3.0

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI ASUS ASMB4:asmb4.cpu1_temperature.last()}<10 or {Template IPMI ASUS ASMB4:asmb4.cpu1_temperature.last()}>65
trigger.name: CPU1 Tempereture Critical

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI ASUS ASMB4:asmb4.cpu2_temperature.last()}<10 or {Template IPMI ASUS ASMB4:asmb4.cpu2_temperature.last()}>65
trigger.name: CPU2 Tempereture Critical

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI ASUS ASMB4:asmb4.tr1_temperature.last()}<10 or {Template IPMI ASUS ASMB4:asmb4.tr1_temperature.last()}>65
trigger.name: TR1 Tempereture Critical

trigger.expression: {Template IPMI ASUS ASMB4:asmb4.tr2_temperature.last()}<10 or {Template IPMI ASUS ASMB4:asmb4.tr2_temperature.last()}>65
trigger.name: TR2 Tempereture Critical
